title: Bhagavad Gita - Chapter 1 | Adult Quiz (25Q)
prompt: In BG 1.1, Dhritarashtra specifically asks Sanjaya what the assembled parties did at which place?
feedback: Dhritarashtra asks about the battle assembly at Kurukshetra, described as a place of pilgrimage (dharma-ksetra).

title: Bhagavad Gita - Chapter 1 | Adult Quiz (25Q)
prompt: According to the purport of BG 1.1, how should Bhagavad-gita be studied to avoid error?
choice2: By reading only the Sanskrit meter
choice3: By scrutinizing it with the help of a devotee in disciplic succession
choice4: By ignoring Arjuna's role as a student
feedback: The purport advises reading Bhagavad-gita very scrutinizingly with the help of a devotee, without motivated interpretations.

title: Bhagavad Gita - Chapter 1 | Adult Quiz (25Q)
prompt: In BG 1.2, after viewing the Pandava army formation, Duryodhana approaches whom first?
feedback: Sanjaya says Duryodhana went to his teacher after seeing the Pandava army arranged in formation.

title: Bhagavad Gita - Chapter 1 | Teen Quiz (20Q)
prompt: What place did Dhritarashtra ask Sanjaya about in BG 1.1?
feedback: Kurukshetra is described as dharma-ksetra, a place for spiritual practice.

title: Bhagavad Gita - Chapter 1 | Kids Quiz (15Q)
prompt: Where does the Bhagavad Gita take place?
feedback: The story of the Bhagavad Gita starts on the battlefield of Kurukshetra.

title: Srimad Bhagavatam - Canto 1, Chapter 1 | Adult Quiz (20Q)
prompt: In SB 1.1.1, what does Sukadeva Gosvami describe?
choice2: Narrations from ancient times with spiritual knowledge
feedback: Sukadeva Gosvami recites narrations that contain both history and transcendental knowledge.
